name: Sea Slug
overview: Huge, disgustingly thick, black oil slicks leak in from a fleet of crippled nuclear tankers out in the once lovely, blue Mediterranean Sea! You speed to the rescue in your reclamations sub, the Sea Slug. Avoid the dangerous nuclear wastes and deadly sea crabs. Can you disperse the oil slicks before it's too late? Good luck to you! You're in command of the wonderful Sea. Slug... fastest and Most efficient sub in the ocean! Today the Slug will be put to the ultimate test. You have been sent to destroy nasty black oil slicks dropped into the water from the disabilitated (sic) ship above. Don't allow the oil slicks to touch bottom! While you're about your work, Pockets of nuclear waste and horrible sea crabs wait to destroy you. Avoid them no Matter what! If you touch either a crab or the pockets of waste... or fail to snatch a slick before it hits bottom, one of your 4 lives will be over! Score 50 points for each oil slick you dispose of.
